name: Silver Package
descriptions: Service Package: $300.00 for 5 hours set pay.
Bartender provides: service and bar materials.
Everything else is provided by the host:
Running water or water bottles to clean tins
Bar setup or bar station (must be provided by host)

name: Reposado Package
descriptions: Set Menu Package: $400.00 for 5 hours set pay.
2 classic drinks (e.g., vodka cranberry, tequila soda)
1 shot of the night (e.g., green tea, Mexican candy)

name: Anejo Package
descriptions: Open Bar Package: $500.00 for 5 hours set pay.
4 classic drinks (e.g., vodka cranberry, tequila soda)
2 shots of the night (e.g., green tea, Mexican candy)
